trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGDRA2COLLECTABLESUPPLYFRONT_00273_GEIMLONA_000_000<tab>“Splendors” is what we've taken to callin' the tools, gear, and other quality items we offer as incentive to our suppliers.

TEXT_REGDRA2COLLECTABLESUPPLYFRONT_00273_GEIMLONA_000_001<tab>You'll need tokens─beggin' your pardon, <var 1A 02 /var>Rowena's<var 1A 01 /var> tokens─to purchase these items. No other forms of payment will be accepted.
TEXT_REGDRA2COLLECTABLESUPPLYFRONT_00273_GEIMLONA_000_005<tab>The tokens you'll need are issued in exchange for scrips. Our representatives here can assist you now, if you like.
TEXT_REGDRA2COLLECTABLESUPPLYFRONT_00273_GEIMLONA_000_006<tab>Of course, if you're short on scrips, you'll have to bring us more collectables...
